draw.ui.tools

Class Tool

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • draw.ui.tools.Tool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OvalTool, RectTool, SelTool

    public abstract class Tool
extends AbstractAction
implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
    Abstract based class for tool implementations in the tool palette. The tools handle all the mouse events from the drawing panel. Class Tool extends AbstractAction and implements MouseListener and MouseMotionListener.

    Extend this class to implement your own tool. Then add an instance of the tool to the tool palette.

    Since:
    Author:
    hp
    See Also:
    ToolPalette, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private final String name
        Name of the tool. The name is used to identify this tool in the tool palette. Tools should have a unique name within the application.

      • palette

        private final ToolPalette palette
        Reference to the tool palette containing the tool

        Parameters:
        name - the unique tool name
        icon - the icon for this tool shown in the tool bar
        palette - the tool palette containing this tool
